title: Greeny in a Bottle
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Smoothies and juice bar, opened Jun 2015. Also offers smoothie bowls, salads, chia pudding, and raw energy balls. Utilizes many different fruits and vegetables, edible wild herbs, super foods. Note that a few dishes and cakes might contain cheese and/or honey - ask.
